greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Restricted growth sequence transform of A173557, Product_{p|n} (p-1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65536
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
A173557(n) = my(f=factor(n)[, 1]); prod(k=1, #f, f[k]-1); \\ This function from _Michel Marcus_, Oct 31 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 29 2017
